column3: Seaforth, Idol Point to Ivory and north
Areas to southeast of Goose Group

column1: ** - indicates that the survey area is within a portion of the FMA
** - see Figure 2 in Nichol et al 2015 for map of these segments
*** - in some segments the area surveyed increased over time as the population increased , example Queen Charlotte Strait
no = not occupied by sea otters. The area was assumed not to be occupied in that year
ns = not surveyed, although area known to be occupied
see Nichol et al 2009, Table 2 for notation about survey platform for each count. Counts after 2004 are boat based only
